description: Liebe Geocacher/innen!Dies ist der 4. Cache von einer Serie aus 6 Caches. AlleÂ 6 Caches sind entlang der Autobahn A4 platziert, jedoch NICHT von der Autobahn aus zu erreichen. A very nice and large cache hidden at a nice place surrounded by a beautiful landscape.Â We arrived here after a very nice walk from cache to cache.Â It was found without problems.Â Many thanks for hiding a real geocache and not a micro "cache" here and for showing us this very nice place.
